Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GENAI does not have the nuance, it is broad and it is also a people pleaser

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Getting feedback from GENAI makes me feel nothing. I know it is AI working off Machine learning based on what it has learnt before. Furthermore, it is programmed it a certain way.
